description:
* Based on the manga by http://anidb.net/cr22893 [Fukuchi Tsubasa].
God is not a position for life, and the current God`s term in office is almost up. Switching things up, he decides to chose the next God through a series of battle games and tournaments. The tournament is not actually fought between the God Candidates, but between junior high school students chosen by the various God Candidates and granted a special power and talents called zai. The winning student receives a blank zai as a reward, to write in whatever ability or talent they want, while their God Candidate becomes the next God.
http://anidb.net/ch3910 [Ueki Kousuke] is one such junior high school student, chosen by http://anidb.net/ch3912 [Kobayashi] and bestowed with the peculiar power to change trash into trees. Neither Kobayashi and Ueki are particularly interested in the tournament, but in order to protect himself and his friends from other chosen students, Ueki is forced to participate. Driven by his image of justice, helped by the guidance and worry of the people who gather around him, Ueki is drawn deeper into the tournament, finding reasons to fight with the intent to win, instead of just to survive.
— written by Quaenorde

REGULAR.description:
Kosuke Ueki is an 8th grader who has the power to turn trash into trees. He`s behavior is closely monitored by his teacher.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 植木耕助・正義の法則

REGULAR.description:
Mori has decided to help Ueki, but she’s starting to see threats in every direction.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: バトル開始!! の法則

REGULAR.description:
Ueki is soon lured into a trap by Adachi, who can turn cotton into stakes.
Source: crunchyroll

Mori is determined to learn more about this tournament so when the opportunity arrives to gain such information from Mr. K, she leaps at the chance.
Source: crunchyroll

Taijutsu no Otoko, Rihou no Housoku
